summary: AIR BAG LIGHT HAS BEEN ON CONSTANTLY. CONSUMER  HAD RECEIVED A RECALL  WHICH IT STATED THAT  VEHICLE HAD TO HAVE A SHELL ON TOP OF THE CABLE SO THAT AIR BAG LIGHT WILL NOT COME ON, BUT AFTER SHE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO GET IT FIXED THE PROBLEM WAS STILL THERE.  DEALER WILL ONLY FIX IT IF THE CONSUMER PAYS FOR IT.*AK
